function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of community ownership of natural resources","Impact":"Decreased resilience and adaptability to environmental changes","Mitigation":"Promote community ownership of resources and sustainable resource management","Technologies":"Community-based resource management systems","People":"Small-scale farmers, pastoralists","Owner":"Local communities, government"},{"Description":"Constraints to human agency and social ecology","Impact":"Limited ability to address problems and solicit support","Mitigation":"Address structural conditions of inequality and empower local communities","Technologies":"Community empowerment programs, education and training initiatives","People":"Local communities, organizations, institutions","Owner":"Government, NGOs, community leaders"},{"Description":"Inadequate translation of rhetoric into practice","Impact":"Failure to implement effective community-based adaptation strategies","Mitigation":"Invest in capacity-building and awareness programs, monitor and evaluate implementation","Technologies":"Monitoring and evaluation tools, capacity-building resources","People":"Policy makers, community leaders, local organizations","Owner":"Government, NGOs, research institutions"}]}
